description: This men’s Merino wool shirt is bringing the style. Its slim cut and back-to-front side seams offer a body-enhancing fit, while its eco-conscious plant-based dye creates an intriguing and one-of-a-kind look. But that’s not all—this tee also brings ZQ-certified Merino wool softness, odor resistance, and temperature regulation. When you want to look good and feel good too ,the Men’s Merino 150 Plant-Based-Dye Baselayer Short Sleeve tee is a wardrobe must-have
name: Smartwool Merino 150 Plant-Based Dye  Baselayer SS - Mens
